<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_mispers_action_item"> <x_snc_mispers_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <address/> <assigned_to display_value="Francis Soo">86826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5d82</assigned_to> <case display_value="MISPERS0001002">6a009c311b745990db301f83b24bcb9a</case> <due_date>2023-07-20 17:55:00</due_date> <id>2751161</id> <notes>Some Mispers move in very specific circles and focussed investigation in the right places can often prove successful.
Officers should consider use of KINS, local charities, religious and community leaders to assist in locating this individual. Officers should consider carefully what information is released and information should take the format similar to a press release.
Also consider notifying local beat team.</notes> <number>ACTION0001028</number> <report_reference>15</report_reference> <start_date>2022-07-20 17:55:00</start_date> <status>Approved</status> <summary>false</summary> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-06 08:31:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0173cb8d1bf59190db301f83b24bcb08</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 10:59:46</sys_updated_on> <title>Consider Community Contacts</title> <type>Other Agencies</type> </x_snc_mispers_action_item> </record_update>
